texts.info_1: Before you will send a new ticket, please check the  following steps and links.

texts.purpose: What purpose it is intended to meet by the new LAPTOP? (mandatory)

texts.improvements: Responsible manager for potential improvements (full name and department)? (mandatory)

texts.fields_filled: All of the mandatory fields have to be filled properly.

checkbox.under: If you need to buy equipment which is under 200 EUR you only need to have approved the purchase by email of manager from your departure.

checkbox.more_than: If you need to buy equipment which is more than 200 EUR you always have to ask your manager to fill Approval form.

checkbox.purchase: Purchase of a new LAPTOP usually takes two weeks.
